I have followed with all my sorrow and sadness since early morning what happened this morning from the accident of President #
On behalf of myself and on behalf of the entire Egyptian people, I extend my deepest condolences to the families and children of the victims and those injured in this tragic incident.
I decided the following: 1. Accepting the resignation of the Minister of Transport and the President of the Railways
2 - The transfer of officials to the Public Prosecution for investigation and quick completion of investigations to find out the cause of this painful incident # President
3. Take all measures from all concerned executive authorities to compensate the families of the victims and the injured and remove all obstacles to them
The official responsible for this incident will be held accountable by the president
The prime minister was commissioned to move to the scene and take the necessary # President
